name: Revivify
description: Revive slugcat and slugpup corpses! This mod works in singleplayer, co-op, and arena.<LINE><LINE>Lay your friend flat on a solid floor and tap GRAB twice per second to resuscitate them. Returning from death's door is an ordeal, so they may remain injured for the rest of the cycle.<LINE><LINE>Configurable. Code at github.com/Dual-Iron/revivify
